column1: Little Goat Diner////Sign up for the newsletter
column2: and you'll get emailed about a lot of awesome specials and events
column3: including special rooftop nights during the summer. They'll occasionally have an open to the public rose tasting
column5: with special food pairings -- the whole experience very reasonably priced (if not priced by the rose flight
column6: with complimentary food bites). Not a lot of people know about this so it feels fun and intimate
column7: like you're part of the Goat family. Plus
column9: you're likely to spot her there from time to time.
